name: Sally the Brave
description: A strong and courageous warrior. Not afraid to lead the charge in battle.

name: Lern the Wise
description: A highly intelligent wizard. Known for his strategic use of spells in combat.

name: Amiko the Cunning
description: A rogue with unparalleled stealth skills. Can disappear into the shadows at will.

name: Jay the Protector
description: A hardy and robust soldier. Has a strong sense of justice and duty.

name: Kira the Discoverer
description: A curious and adventurous scientist. Always seeking to learn and discover new things.
